entities.name: Always Displayed Components
entities.content:
- Error display block
- Project information header
- Contract list table
- Tab navigation
- Screen title ("Contract List" or "Expected Order List")
- Contract data columns (type, contract number, contract/property information, scheduled contract date, planned, completed)

entities.name: Radio Button Selection (Selection)
entities.content:
| **Contract Type** | **Display Condition** | **Control Flag** | **Flag Value** | **Button Status** |
|--------------|--------------|----------------|--------------|----------------|
| **Normal Contract** | `keiyakuCardSyubetsuCd < 90` | `keiyakuUkagaiKbn` | `≠ 1` | Enabled |
| **External Contract** | `keiyakuCardSyubetsuCd < 90` | `keiyakuUkagaiKbn` | `= 1` | Disabled |
| **Special Contract** | `keiyakuCardSyubetsuCd >= 90` | None | None | Hidden |

entities.name: Contract Number Link (Contract Number)
entities.content:
| **Display Condition** | **Control Flag** | **Flag Value** | **Link Status** | **Device Impact** |
|--------------|----------------|--------------|----------------|------------------|
| **Clickable Link Display** | `keiyakuCardSyubetsuCd` AND `keiyakuUkagaiKbn` AND `User-Agent` | `< 90` AND `≠ 1` AND `≠ iPad` | Active Link | Desktop/PC |
| **Text Only Display** | `keiyakuCardSyubetsuCd` OR `keiyakuUkagaiKbn` OR `User-Agent` | `>= 90` OR `= 1` OR `= iPad` | Text Display | iPad/External |
| **Text Only (iPad)** | `User-Agent` | `= iPad` | Text Display | iPad only |
| **Text Only (External)** | `keiyakuUkagaiKbn` | `= 1` | Text Display | External Contract |
| **Text Only (Special)** | `keiyakuCardSyubetsuCd` | `>= 90` | Text Display | Special Contract |

entities.name: Function Button Display
entities.content:
| **Button** | **Display Condition** | **Control Flag** | **Flag Value** | **User Impact** | **Device Impact** |
|------------|--------------|----------------|--------------|------------------|------------------|
| **New Contract Creation** | New Contract Creation | `shinkiKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg` | `= "true"` | Same logic for Admin/User | Hidden on iPad |
| **Additional Contract Creation** | Additional Contract Creation | `tsuikaKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg` | `= "true"` | Same logic for Admin/User | Hidden on iPad |
| **Contract Data Update** | Contract Data Update | `keiyakuDataHenkoKahiFlg` | `= "true"` | Same logic for Admin/User | Hidden on iPad |
| **Contract Data Delete** | Contract Data Delete | `ankenBunruiCd` | `≠ 30,40` | Disabled for project types 30,40 | Hidden on iPad |
| **Paid After Contract Card Creation** | Paid After Contract Creation | `kaniKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg` | `= "true"` | Same logic for Admin/User | Hidden on iPad |
| **Multiple Order Creation** | Multiple Order Creation | `hukusuJyutyuSakuseiHyoujiFlg` | `= "true"` | Same logic for Admin/User | Hidden on iPad |

entities.name: Delete Button Constraints
entities.content:
| **Project Type** | **Control Flag** | **Flag Value** | **Button Status** |
|--------------|----------------|--------------|----------------|
| **Normal Project** | `ankenBunruiCd` | `≠ 30,40` | Enabled |
| **Special Project** | `ankenBunruiCd` | `= 30,40` | Disabled |

entities.name: Body Content Selection
entities.content:
| **Previous Screen Type** | **Control Flag** | **Flag Value** | **Body Content** |
|------------------|----------------|--------------|----------------------|
| **After Screen** | `pre_screan` | `CONTRACT_KEIYAKU_CARD_PRE_SCREAN_AFTER` | `keiyakuListAfter/body.jsp` |
| **Other** | `pre_screan` | `≠ CONTRACT_KEIYAKU_CARD_PRE_SCREAN_AFTER` | `keiyakuList/body.jsp` |

entities.name: Screen Title Display
entities.content:
| **Project Type** | **Control Flag** | **Flag Value** | **Title Display** |
|--------------|----------------|--------------|-------------------|
| **Expected Order** | `ankenBunruiCd` | `= 30` | "Expected Order List" |
| **Expected Order (Type 40)** | `ankenBunruiCd` | `= 40` | "Expected Order List" |
| **Other** | `ankenBunruiCd` | `≠ 30,40` | "Contract List" |

---

entities.name: Button Display Matrix
entities.content:
| **Button** | **Display Condition** | **Control Flag** | **Flag Value** | **Impact on User Role** |
|------------|--------------|----------------|--------------|--------------------------|
| **New Contract Creation** | Contract Creation Allowed | `shinkiKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg` | `= "true"` | Same logic for Admin/User |
| **Additional Contract Creation** | Additional Contract Allowed | `tsuikaKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg` | `= "true"` | Same logic for Admin/User |
| **Contract Data Update** | Contract Update Allowed | `keiyakuDataHenkoKahiFlg` | `= "true"` | Same logic for Admin/User |
| **Contract Data Delete** | Contract Delete Allowed | `ankenBunruiCd` | `≠ 30,40` | Disabled for special projects |
| **Paid After Contract Card Creation** | After Contract Allowed | `kaniKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg` | `= "true"` | Same logic for Admin/User |
| **Multiple Order Creation** | Multiple Order Allowed | `hukusuJyutyuSakuseiHyoujiFlg` | `= "true"` | Same logic for Admin/User |

entities.name: Button State Flowchart
entities.content:
```mermaid
flowchart TD
    A[Load Contract List] --> B{Device Type Check}
    B -->|iPad| C[Hide All Function Buttons]
    B -->|Desktop/PC| D{Project Type Check}
    
    D -->|ankenBunruiCd = 30,40| E[Disable Delete Button]
    D -->|ankenBunruiCd ≠ 30,40| F[Enable Delete Button]
    
    D --> G{New Creation Flag Check}
    G -->|shinkiKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg = true| H[Show New Contract Button]
    G -->|shinkiKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg = false| I[Hide New Contract Button]
    
    D --> J{Additional Creation Flag Check}
    J -->|tsuikaKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg = true| K[Show Additional Contract Button]
    J -->|tsuikaKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg = false| L[Hide Additional Contract Button]
    
    D --> M{Update Flag Check}
    M -->|keiyakuDataHenkoKahiFlg = true| N[Show Update Button]
    M -->|keiyakuDataHenkoKahiFlg = false| O[Hide Update Button]
    
    D --> P{After Contract Flag Check}
    P -->|kaniKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg = true| Q[Show After Contract Button]
    P -->|kaniKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg = false| R[Hide After Contract Button]
    
    D --> S{Multiple Order Flag Check}
    S -->|hukusuJyutyuSakuseiHyoujiFlg = true| T[Show Multiple Order Button]
    S -->|hukusuJyutyuSakuseiHyoujiFlg = false| U[Hide Multiple Order Button]
    
    C --> V[Button Display Complete]
    E --> V
    F --> V
    H --> V
    I --> V
    K --> V
    L --> V
    N --> V
    O --> V
    Q --> V
    R --> V
    T --> V
    U --> V
```

---

entities.name: Contract Row Display Conditions
entities.content:
| **Element** | **Display Condition** | **Control Flag** | **Flag Value** | **Display Status** |
|----------|--------------|----------------|--------------|--------------|
| **Radio Button** | Contract Selection | `keiyakuCardSyubetsuCd` AND `keiyakuUkagaiKbn` | `< 90` AND `≠ 1` | Enabled |
| **Radio Button** | External Contract | `keiyakuCardSyubetsuCd` AND `keiyakuUkagaiKbn` | `< 90` AND `= 1` | Disabled |
| **Radio Button** | Special Contract | `keiyakuCardSyubetsuCd` | `>= 90` | Hidden |
| **Contract Link** | Clickable Link | `keiyakuCardSyubetsuCd` AND `keiyakuUkagaiKbn` AND `Device` | `< 90` AND `≠ 1` AND `≠ iPad` | Active Link |
| **Contract Link** | Text Only | `keiyakuCardSyubetsuCd` OR `keiyakuUkagaiKbn` OR `Device` | `>= 90` OR `= 1` OR `= iPad` | Text Display |

entities.name: Contract Data Display
entities.content:
| **Data Item** | **Display Condition** | **Control Flag** | **Flag Value** | **Display Format** |
|----------------|--------------|----------------|--------------|--------------|
| **Contract Number** | Always Displayed | None | Always | Text or Link |
| **Contract Type** | Always Displayed | `tuikaKbn` | `0=Main, 1=Additional` | Text |
| **Project Name** | Always Displayed | `koujiBukkenName` | Always | Text |
| **Contractor Name** | Always Displayed | `keiyakusyaName` | Always | Text |
| **Approval Status** | Always Displayed | `syouninZyoukyou` | Always | Text |
| **Contract Amount** | Always Displayed | `zeikomiKeiyakuKingaku` | Always | Currency |

---

entities.name: iPad Device Support
entities.content:
| **Element** | **iPad Behavior** | **Control Logic** | **Impact** |
|----------|--------------|------------------|----------|
| **All Function Buttons** | Hidden | `logic:notMatch header="User-Agent" value="iPad"` | No button operations on iPad |
| **Contract Link** | Text Only | `logic:match header="User-Agent" value="iPad"` | No links on iPad |
| **Form Item Titles** | Hidden | `logic:notMatch header="User-Agent" value="iPad"` | Simplified UI on iPad |
| **Comments** | Hidden | `logic:notMatch header="User-Agent" value="iPad"` | No explanatory text on iPad |

entities.name: JavaScript Validation Rules
entities.content:
| **Validation Type** | **Trigger** | **Condition** | **Action** |
|--------------|--------------|----------|----------|
| **Contract Selection** | Button Click | Radio Not Selected | Alert: "Please select a contract card." |
| **Additional Contract Selection** | Additional Contract Button | Radio Not Selected | Alert: "Please select the main and multiple subjects." |
| **Delete Confirmation** | Delete Button | User Confirmation Required | `comDeleteConfirm()` Dialog |
| **Form Submission** | All Actions | Form Validation OK | Execute `comSubmit()` |

---

entities.name: Hidden Form Fields
entities.content:
| **Field Name** | **Purpose** | **Default Value** | **Usage** |
|------------|----------|------------|--------------|
| `actionType` | Action Type Identifier | Empty | Set by JavaScript function |
| `keiyakuKey` | Selected Contract Key | Empty | Set when contract is selected |
| `spExecuteKbn` | Execution Type Code | Empty | Set by JavaScript function |
| `ankenCheckKbn` | Project Check Flag | `"0"` | Reset when submitted |
| `hanbaiBukkenNo` | Sales Property Number | Empty | Property identification |
| `keiyakuCardSyubetsuCd` | Contract Card Type Code | Empty | Contract type identification |
| `afterJyutyuNo` | Changed Order Number | From VO | After-contract reference |
| `honninKakuninChk` | Identity Verification Check | `"0"` | Reset after confirmation |
| `syunouDaikouErrMsg` | Collection Proxy Error Message | Empty | Error display |
| `preScreenKbn` | Previous Screen Flag | Empty | Screen transition control |
| `ankenNo` | Project Number | From VO | Project identification |

---

entities.name: Main Control Flag List
entities.content:
| **Flag Name** | **Purpose** | **Values** | **Impact** |
|--------------|----------|--------|----------|
| `shinkiKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg` | New Contract Creation Permission | `"true"` / `"false"` | New Contract Button Display |
| `tsuikaKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg` | Additional Contract Creation Permission | `"true"` / `"false"` | Additional Contract Button Display |
| `keiyakuDataHenkoKahiFlg` | Contract Data Update Permission | `"true"` / `"false"` | Update Button Display |
| `kaniKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg` | After Contract Creation Permission | `"true"` / `"false"` | After Contract Button Display |
| `hukusuJyutyuSakuseiHyoujiFlg` | Multiple Order Creation Permission | `"true"` / `"false"` | Multiple Order Button Display |
| `ankenBunruiCd` | Project Type Classification | Various codes | Delete Button Status, Screen Title |
| `keiyakuCardSyubetsuCd` | Contract Sub-type Classification | `< 90` / `>= 90` | Radio/Link Visibility |
| `keiyakuUkagaiKbn` | External Contract Flag | `1` / `≠ 1` | Radio/Link Status |
| `tuikaKbn` | Contract Classification (Main/Additional) | `0` (Main) / `1` (Additional) | Contract Type Display |
| `pre_screan` | Previous Screen Indicator | `CONTRACT_KEIYAKU_CARD_PRE_SCREAN_AFTER` / Other | Body Selection |

---

entities.name: Action Types and Screen Transitions
entities.content:
| **Action Type** | **Description** | **spExecuteKbn** | **Requirements** | **Destination Screen** |
|--------------------|----------|------------------|----------|----------------|
| `new_contract` | Create New Contract | `1` | No Contract Selection Needed | `keiyakuListAssign.do` |
| `update_contract` | Update Contract Data | `2` | Contract Selection Required | `henkoKeiyakuDispatch.do` |
| `add_contract` | Create Additional Contract | `3` | Contract Selection Required | `tsuikaKeiyakuDispatch.do` |
| `delete_contract` | Delete Contract | `-` | Contract Selection + Confirmation | `keiyakuDelete.do` |
| `new_yuusyou_contract` | Create Paid After Contract Card | `5` | No Contract Selection Needed | `yuusyouKeiyakuListAssign.do` |
| `new_yuusyou_after_contract` | Create After Contract from After Screen | `6` | No Contract Selection Needed | `moushideSelectInit.do` |
| `keiyaku_card_anchor` | Click Contract Link | `-` | No Contract Selection Needed | `anchorKeiyakuDispatch.do` |

---

entities.name: Button State Flowchart
entities.mermaid:
flowchart TD
    A[Load Contract List] --> B{Device Type Check}
    B -->|iPad| C[Hide All Function Buttons]
    B -->|Desktop/PC| D{Project Type Check}
    
    D -->|ankenBunruiCd = 30,40| E[Disable Delete Button]
    D -->|ankenBunruiCd ≠ 30,40| F[Enable Delete Button]
    
    D --> G{New Creation Flag Check}
    G -->|shinkiKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg = true| H[Show New Contract Button]
    G -->|shinkiKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg = false| I[Hide New Contract Button]
    
    D --> J{Additional Creation Flag Check}
    J -->|tsuikaKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg = true| K[Show Additional Contract Button]
    J -->|tsuikaKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg = false| L[Hide Additional Contract Button]
    
    D --> M{Update Flag Check}
    M -->|keiyakuDataHenkoKahiFlg = true| N[Show Update Button]
    M -->|keiyakuDataHenkoKahiFlg = false| O[Hide Update Button]
    
    D --> P{After Contract Flag Check}
    P -->|kaniKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg = true| Q[Show After Contract Button]
    P -->|kaniKeiyakuSakuseiKahiFlg = false| R[Hide After Contract Button]
    
    D --> S{Multiple Order Flag Check}
    S -->|hukusuJyutyuSakuseiHyoujiFlg = true| T[Show Multiple Order Button]
    S -->|hukusuJyutyuSakuseiHyoujiFlg = false| U[Hide Multiple Order Button]
    
    C --> V[Button Display Complete]
    E --> V
    F --> V
    H --> V
    I --> V
    K --> V
    L --> V
    N --> V
    O --> V
    Q --> V
    R --> V
    T --> V
    U --> V
